participant_1.background:
I am married.
I like doing art projects.
I travel a lot.
I enjoy spending time with family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
I have not been on a date since high school.
I have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.
I am trying to open my own teaching program for horse racing.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go horse racing! I've been betting on horses since high school and I've made a lot of money doing it. I'm actually trying to open my own teaching program for horse racing.
That's really cool! I've never been to a horse race, but I've always wanted to go.
You should go! It's so much fun! I can teach you everything you need to know about betting on horses.
That would be great! I'll definitely take you up on that.
Sounds good!
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel. I've been to all over the world. I love experiencing new cultures and learning about different people.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to travel more, but I don't have the money.
You don't need a lot of money to travel. You can do it on the cheap. I've been to some amazing places for under $500.
That's true. I'll have to look into that.
You should! Traveling is the best way to learn about the world.
I'm sure it is. I'll definitely have to try it sometime.
Good! I hope you have a great time.
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to do art projects. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to try. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds nice. I'm not very good at art projects either, but I still enjoy them. I'm glad you have a good time with your family and friends.
Thanks! I'm glad too.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. I teach kindergarten.
That's great! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a lot of fun! I love working with kids.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I do.
